text: is a Japanese football player. He played for the Japan national team. ==Biography== Tagawa was born in Kagoshima Prefecture on February 11, 1999. He joined J1 League club Sagan Tosu from their youth team in 2017. He played many matches from first season. In 2019, he moved to FC Tokyo. In 2017, Tagawa was selected the Japan U-20 national team for 2017 U-20 World Cup. In 2019, he also played at 2019 U-20 World Cup. In December 2019, he was selected the Japan national team for 2019 E-1 Football Championship.
